en.about_subtitle: Discover the story behind this website
en.about_content1: Welcome to my personal website! This is a space where I showcase my creativity, technology, and projects. I'm passionate about front-end development, open-source communities, and modern web design.
en.about_content2: This website is hosted on GitHub Pages, built with Tailwind CSS and JavaScript, aiming to provide a seamless user experience. In the future, I plan to add more features like a blog or portfolio. Stay tuned!
